title: Couple caught urinating in a Gold Coast elevator
text:
CCTV footage appears to show a couple urinating in the lift of a Gold Coast RSL club.

A couple have been blasted on social media after footage emerged of them using the elevator as a toilet at a Gold Coast RSL.

CCTV footage from inside a lift at the Surfers Paradise RSL building shows a man and a woman entering the elevator at 10.25pm last Friday night.

The man, who is holding a bottle of beer, appears to go to the back corner in the lift and unzip his pants.

The woman is seen laughing as she presses all the buttons and then squats down in the other corner and urinate.

At one point she leans over to push more of the buttons before returning to her squatting position.

Footage of the incident was posted to Facebook by Jane Elliott, who works in the six storey building and also uses the lift.

“Anyone know these low-life animals? If so, please let me know. Please share and ask your friends to share,” she wrote.

“These scumbags think urinating in a lift is socially acceptable. This happened at the RSL Centre in Surfers Paradise on Friday night just gone.

“The police would like to have a chat to them. Personally, I’d like to rub their faces in it.”

Social media users were disgusted by the video, calling for the couple to be named.

“Hope the police get to meet them. Horrendous,” one person wrote.

“Hopefully someone will identify these disrespectful grubs,” another said.

Ms Elliot later responded saying that someone had messaged her and passed on the details of the woman, which she then gave to the police.

A Queensland Police spokesperson confirmed to news.com.au that the police were investigating the incident.
description: A couple have been blasted on social media after footage emerged of them using the elevator as a toilet at a Gold Coast RSL.
